title: MD
biography: Meharban Singh is an Indian pediatrician, neonatologist and medical writer, who has published on child care. He was WHO consultant on Newborn Care in South-East Asia for longtime. He has served for more than 3 decades in All India Institute of Medical Sciences, New Delhi. He was president of the Indian Academy of Pediatrics in 1993.
aiSummary: Meharban Singh is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 45 at Neonatal care (Member). Has been published in Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, Nature Biotechnology, Journal of Pharmaceutical Sciences. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
